Title: Relates to the Long Island rail road commuter's council
Summary: Decreases the vacancy appointments by the county executives of Nassau, Suffolk, Queens or Brooklyn county from three members each to one member each.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266-d, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the process for filling vacancies on the Long Island rail road commuter's council
